title: Watch our webinar on CBAM - essenscia
author: Emilie Hanchar
source: Essenscia - Belgian Federation For Chemistry And Life Sciences Industries
text: What will be the impact of the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) on your business during the ongoing transitional phase? That was the main topic of the webinar organized by essenscia, together with KPMG, earlier this month. The session focused on the scope of the CBAM, customs procedures, information to be reported, specific reporting formats, timelines and potential penalties and risks associated with non-compliance.
